title: God's Good Design for Sex
itunes:author: Featured Guest: Jessie Minassian
itunes:summary:
Hollywood has distorted the meaning of sex. It's crucial to teach your kids God's design for sexuality. John and Danny highlight important talking points for parents.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get our "Launch Into the Teen Years" Kit: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/launch-into-the-teen-years-kit#refcd=1070603

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/gods-good-design-for-sex/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
